org.forgerock.openam.utils

Class ValidateIPaddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.utils.ValidateIPaddress

  • public final class ValidateIPaddress
extends Object
    Validates IP V4 and V6 addresses.

    • Method Detail

      • isIPv4

        public static boolean isIPv4(String ipAddress)
        Determines if IP address is IP version 4.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - is the IP address that is being verified
        Returns:
        true if IP address is IPv4, false if it is not IPv4

      • isIPv6

        public static boolean isIPv6(String ipAddress)
        Determines if IP address is IP version 6.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - is the IP address that is being verified
        Returns:
        true if IP address is IPv6, false if it is not IPv6

      • isValidIP

        public static boolean isValidIP(String ipAddress)
        Determines if an IP address is valid.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - is the IP address that is being verified
        Returns:
        true is the IP address is valid, false if it is not valid
